searchView.searchPlaceholder: I am looking for two General Practitioners from the UK with MRCGP qualifications who speak English. The salary for a full-time position is $300,000 per year.
searchView.noMatchesDescription: We couldn't find any healthcare workers matching your criteria. Try adjusting your search parameters or broadening your requirements.

workersResults.chooseProfiles: Choose up to 10 favorite profiles to help refine your recommendations. Based on your selection, our AI agent will analyze, score, and find similar profiles. This ensures we make the best offers to the most suitable candidates, saving you time and effort in the hiring process!

company.title: Company Settings
company.subTitle: Manage your company profile and business details
company.logoInstructions: Drag and drop an image, or click to browse
company.logoHint: PNG, JPG, WEBP, or SVG up to 5MB

pricing.title: Choose Your Recruitment Plan
pricing.subtitle: Flexible pricing designed for healthcare organisations of all sizes — from small GP clinics to large groups or hospitals. Every plan includes verified candidates, AI-assisted sourcing, and smart matching based on both sides' wants, needs, preferences, skills, and role requirements.

startingFee.title: Start with {{amount}} {{currency}}
startingFee.withFee: Begin recruiting with a {{amount}} {{currency}} starting fee
startingFee.withoutFee: Begin recruiting immediately with no upfront costs or commitments
startingFee.payWhenSuccessful: Pay success fees only on successful hire

availablePlans.title: Available Plans
availablePlans.successFeeNotice: Success fee is paid in split payment: 50% when candidate signs, 50% when they start

customSolutions.title: CUSTOM SOLUTIONS
customSolutions.description: Need something specific? Or do you need locum or short-term placements? Contact us for tailored recruitment packages with premium benefits and competitive rates

page.title: Custom Healthcare Recruitment
page.subtitle: Tailored solutions for your healthcare staffing needs with flexible pricing and dedicated support

feature1.title: The Largest Healthcare Worker Database in Europe
feature1.description: Access to tens of thousands of healthcare professionals - from general nurses to specialized doctors. We cover all fields and experience levels your organization may need.

feature2.title: Data-Driven Approach
feature2.description: Our AI-powered recruitment agent analyzes candidates' job preferences, past behavior, psychological profiles, and statistical data to understand each professional’s desires and patterns.

feature3.title: AI-Powered Recruitment Agent Working Around the Clock
feature3.description: A smart AI agent searches for candidates who meet your criteria, holds initial conversations at times that suit them, and schedules meetings or video calls between you and the candidates – all automatically, 24/7.

feature4.title: A Smart Investment That Increases Your Revenue
feature4.description: Investing in our software means faster access to suitable doctors and healthcare professionals – which leads to more filled positions, higher service capacity, and revenue growth. Our solutions are designed to make your recruitment efforts deliver measurable business results.

contactForm.title: Contact Us
contactForm.description: Tell us about your specific recruitment needs and we'll get back to you shortly.
contactForm.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your specific recruitment needs...

planSelection.paymentInfo: Split payment: 50% when candidate signs, 50% when they start

planSelection.vatAdded: VAT will be added to prices
planSelection.customDescription: Contact us to discuss your specific requirements and get a tailored plan.
planSelection.confirmDescription: We will charge you {{amount}} {{currency}} each month for this plan.
planSelection.confirmDescriptionFree: We will collect your details to confirm your subscription. No upfront payment required.

planDescriptions.riskFreeStarter: Perfect for trying our service with no upfront cost. Pay only when you hire.
planDescriptions.smartPlan: Balanced approach with moderate upfront cost and competitive success fees.
planDescriptions.superPlan: Premium service with higher upfront investment and lower success fees.

enterprise.customPricingDescription: Tailored pricing based on your specific needs and requirements.
enterprise.dedicatedSupportDescription: Personal account manager and priority support.

contactDialog.title: Contact Us
contactDialog.description: Choose how you would like to get in touch about Enterprise solutions.
contactDialog.messagePlaceholder: Tell us briefly about your needs

planDescriptionsStatic.starter: For small clinics hiring 1–2 doctors or nurses a year.
planDescriptionsStatic.smart: For growing clinics with regular hiring needs.
planDescriptionsStatic.enterprise: For healthcare organisations (10+ hires per year).

UK.paymentSchedule: 50% upon candidate confirmation, 50% upon start date
UK.installments: Success fee may be billed in full or flexible up to £500 installments
UK.taxInfo: All prices exclude VAT if purchased as a UK business

AU.paymentSchedule: 50% upon candidate signing, 50% upon start date
AU.installments: Success fee may be billed in full or flexible $2,500 installments
AU.taxInfo: All prices exclude GST if purchased as an Australian business

EE.paymentSchedule: 50% upon candidate confirmation, 50% upon start date
EE.installments: Success fee may be billed in full or flexible up to €500 installments

OTHER.paymentSchedule: 50% upon candidate confirmation, 50% upon start date
OTHER.installments: Success fee may be billed in full or flexible up to €500 installments
OTHER.taxInfo: All prices exclude VAT if purchased as an EU business
